General.Name: ABCO Electronics Co. Ltd
General.Description: ABCO Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells passive electronic components in South Korea and internationally. The company's products comprise electronic circuit components, such as resistors, coils, and capacitors; power inductors that are used in DC-DC converters and power line circuits; chip inductors, which are used in mobile communication, pagers, and cordless phone appliances; and thick and thin film chip resistors, thick film chip resistor arrays, and ultra-low resistance metal strip resistors. It also offers carbon film, metal film, metal oxide, fusible, non-inductive wire wound, power type silicon coated wire wound, and WIRC resistors; axial inductors for use in consumer electronics, such as VCR, TV, audio equipment, mobile communication, and electronic appliances; noise filters that are used in noise suppressions, RF modules, PC interfaces, CD/DVD-ROM, etc.; electric double layer capacitors, which are used as back up for memory and clock functions of cellular and cordless phones, PDA, MP3 products, digital cameras, etc.; and UWB dongles. The company was formerly known as ABCO Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ABCO Electronics Co., Ltd. in December 2001. ABCO Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
